DOC.brief_summary: This study determine overall analgesic efficacy three different fix dose ibuprofen plus acetaminophen formulation compare ibuprofen alone placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Novel Ibuprofen Acetaminophen Combination Formulations Treatment Post-surgical Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Males females 16 40 year age Moderate severe postoperative pain follow surgical extraction three third molar teeth Presence history significant hepatic , renal , endocrine , cardiovascular , neurological , psychiatric , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , hematologic metabolic disorder Pregnant breastfeeding female
